thread.title: DMRC Recruitment 2017 Engineers (03 Vacancies)

author: noreply@blogger.com (dinesh prabhu)
title: DMRC Recruitment 2017 Engineers (03 Vacancies)
text:
Section Engineer - Tie Tamper Operator / Junior Engineer - Tie Tamper Operator 03 58 – 62 Years as on 01/01/2017 ₹ 41,300/- / ₹ 31,400/- 
Qualification and Experience : Diploma in Mechanical / Electrical Engineering. Minimum 2 year working experience as Tie Tamper Operator. 
Selection Process: Personal Interview followed by Medical examination 
How to Apply : The eligible and willing candidates may apply in the prescribed application format. Completed applications along with all the relevant documents and testimonials should be addressed to General Manager (HR), IIIrd Floor, Metro Bhawan Fire Brigade Lane Barakhamba Road, New Delhi-110001 by Speed Post. The last date for receipt of applications is 14/03/2017 . The Postal cover envelope super Scribed with Name of the Post ___
